subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “to be done repeatedly; as before”
: A terminative derivation from {{och-l|二|two}}, literally “got to be done twice/again”. Alternatively, from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-n(j)aŋ||to follow; to repeat}}.
